title: why is funnel still allowed in 3's?
body:
So unfun, really makes me want to stop playing the game mode which is already starving for players. They removed funnel in 5's, why keep it in 3's? 

@meddler

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=覺 Sona 覺,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xvnR7bxL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-02-18T02:39:23.646+0000)
>
> ?

funnel is when the jungler takes the jungle in one lane to get a massive gold and xp lead.
How about you stop trying and find trio to play with

The funneling passive is still active on the jg items. So it's not the best thing to do in 3s either, but since it can be done faster to get the fully upgraded item it is still seen there unfortunately.
Because riot doesn't care about 3v3 be happy you can still play it.
